title: DETAILED CHARGE MECHANICS
text:
'When the minotaur entered the field, I could hardly believe what I was seeing. A vast amount of muscle and fur stood before me, and the stench was overwhelming. He bellowed, what appeared to be a challenge, in a language I could not understand. Though the exact words were beyond my ken - he made his intention of profound violence known as he lumbered towards me.'

- Bastian, Human Bard.
